channel.title: Need help with [PI] server
channel.description:
in duel arena when you put prayer on before duel and put prayer off it stays on in the duel it doesn't turn off, also when someone wears d claws before duel and shield is turned off it doesn't take the claws off.
these are the only 2 bugs i need to fix can someone help me please!

item.title: Need help with [PI] server
item.dc:creator: @looted_y00 looted y00
item.description:
@looted_y00 wrote:

Find the code that teleports you into the arena and put in something like

!& p.prayer == on

^ i dont do pi so that is a very rough guess

Read full topic
